    public class PointsArea
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener

    • Method Detail

      • paintComponent

        protected void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        When the mouse is clicked, a new black point is drawn on the canvas. The convex and angle hulls are as well drawn by this method.
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
        See Also:
        JComponent.paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics)

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        If the mouse is pressed and there is no nearby point or 'Ctrl' key is not pressed, then a new one is drawn. If 'Ctrl' is pressed, the nearest point is deleted. If 'Ctrl' is not pressed and there is a nearby point, the point will be moved.
        Specified by:
        mousePressed in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
        See Also:
        MouseListener.mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent)

      • mouseReleased

        Specified by:

        See Also:
